pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, July 21, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

12:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the National Summit on Antisemitism.

The National Summit will be streamed live on Canadian Heritage’s official Facebook page: www.facebook.com/CdnHeritage

Media appearances

4:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Barrie’s Rock 95.

5:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Omni News: Arabic Edition.
